+package test;
+
+import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertNotNull;
+
+import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
+
+public class JUnit5Test {
+
+    @Test
+    void junit5ShouldWork() {
+        System.err.println("JUnit 5 test working!");
+        assertNotNull(this);
+    }
+}
